body_html:
Today I upgraded to the Tensorflow 1.8,

I can't believe that the problem was solved now!

I don't know what you have changed in the code which relates to this, but I can not see this specific issue anymore. But please keep this open till I do more tests.

I had upgraded the Keras to 2.1.6 before (because it had released sooner), but it did not change the situation.

body:
Today I upgraded to the Tensorflow 1.8, 

I can't believe that the problem was solved now! 

I don't know what you have changed in the code which relates to this, but I can not see this specific issue anymore. But please keep this open till I do more tests.

I had upgraded the Keras to 2.1.6 before (because it had released sooner), but it did not change the situation.
